title: Cloud Secure special
subtitle: Cloud Secure discount offered
author: admin
body:
Cloud Secure is offering a deal of $3.75 per month on startup shared hosting. This deal includes a one time 30 day free trial, so the first month is on us.

This offer includes unlimited data storage, unlimited transfers, 5 hosted domains and more.

Lower prices are also offered for yearly signups.

Visit https://cloudsecure.host  today.
